mainContent.description: We host a wide range of business events designed to strengthen relationships, promote knowledge sharing, and inspire collaboration across industries. These gatherings bring together entrepreneurs, industry experts, diplomats, and policymakers to exchange ideas, explore partnerships, and discuss emerging trends that shape the future of business. From workshops, seminars, and conferences to large-scale international forums, GBA’s events cater to businesses at every stage of growth. Each event is carefully curated to provide insights on leadership, innovation, finance, marketing, technology, and trade opportunities, enabling members to stay informed and competitive. A landmark example of GBA’s event leadership was the organisation of the ASEAN Business Forum, the largest international business forum ever held in Gujranwala, which brought together representatives from ASEAN and Southeast Asian countries. The event marked a milestone in cross-border dialogue and economic cooperation, reaffirming Gujranwala’s position as a rising hub of global business engagement.
